scripts.release:gzip: sh -c 'cd dist; tar czf $0 --exclude *.concat.js --exclude "*.map" --exclude .DS_Store *; mv $0 ..' pzpr-$npm_package_version.tar.gz
scripts.release:bz2: sh -c 'cd dist; tar cjf $0 --exclude *.concat.js --exclude "*.map" --exclude .DS_Store *; mv $0 ..' pzpr-$npm_package_version.tar.bz2
scripts.release:zip: sh -c 'cd dist; zip -9qr $0 * -x *.concat.js -x *.map -x pzpr-variety/*.map -x .DS_Store; mv $0 ..' pzpr-$npm_package_version.zip
